metadata.title: CVE-2022-2211 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in libguestfs. This issue occurs whilecalculating the greatest possible number of matching keys in the get_keys()function. This flaw leads to a denial of service, either by mistake ormalicious actor.

criterions.comment: guestfs-tools package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
